QuestData.Title: The Holy Water of Clarity
QuestData.Description: Hey, listen. You don't look like any old tourist, and I'm in a bit of a pickle. My cousin up north sent me this weird artifact, and I need your help to... ah... identify it.$b$bTo start out, I'm going to need you to obtain The Holy Water of Clarity. Rumor has it that whoever drinks from this spring is given a vision of clarity.$b$bSounds pretty promising, doesn't it?$b$bObtain it from the Nek'mani Wellspring at the peak of the naga camp. Good luck!
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain The Holy Water of Clarity from the Nek'mani Wellspring in the Cape of Stranglethorn.
